attributes.action: Scrap proposals for a central database of all mobile phone and internet traffic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government is going to debate the possibility of having a centralised communications database that will keep a record of all forms of electronic communication in the name of national security. However, with the government having control of all of this information the risk of the government exploiting it is far too severe.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
